attributes.action: Rename August bank holiday NHS day.
attributes.additional_details:
Since its inception the NHS has made an enormous contribution to the health an wellbeing of generations of people of all races, religions and social class. Its staff, doctors, nurses, health care assistants, cleaners, porters etc... do a job that most of us could not.
I believe that as a small sign of appreciation the August bank holiday should be designated NHS day.
If you agree please sign the petition and show your appreciation.
